description: Brief description of the medicine and its traditional use
Turmeric has been used for thousands of years in Ayurvedic medicine for its anti-inflammatory and digestive properties.
Ginger has been used in Traditional Chinese Medicine for digestive health and nausea relief.

benefits: Reduces stress; Improves energy; Supports immunity
description: Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb used in Ayurvedic medicine for stress relief and energy enhancement.
Neem has been used in traditional Indian medicine for its antimicrobial and skin-healing properties.

benefits: Supports respiratory health; Reduces stress; Antioxidant
description: Tulsi, or Holy Basil, is considered sacred in Ayurvedic medicine and used for respiratory and stress-related conditions.
